content: I love conspiracy theorists like you Ian. I wonder how you sleep at night with all these sinister interconnections swirling around. You might try doing a little research regarding his decisions ro determine how many democrat appointed judges voted on issues the same way he did. And if you were honest you would admit that Roe v Wade was an extra-constitutional decision, and not based either in truth, or in the constitution, so not defending planned parenthood would be a natural course for a constitutionalist.
